document.full_text: the memphis grizzlies clinched their first post-season berth since the 2005/06 season with a 101-96 victory over the sacramento kings on friday.
document.title: grizzlies beat kings to make playoffs
lines_and_colors: the memphis grizzlies clinched their first post-season berth since the 2005/06 season with a 101-96 victory over the sacramento kings on friday.
